content: SeedlyTV EP05 Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019After pick a REIT, how do we decide the price to enter?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 May 2019Track the historical trend of the NAV and price movement. The best entry point will be when the gap between NAV and price are at the narrowest.0 comments0

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 27 May 2019There are many ways to do so. One way to is to check the price to book ratio and determine whether that is a fair price that you want to pay for.0 comments0
